name: Bounce Back (MatthewChrobak)
description:
You are hired as a bouncer at the "Bounce Back" Casino and your boss wants you to manage the line. Your job is to reject people from coming back into the casino that have either caused too much trouble, or won too much money.

Your goal is to win enough money, retire, and live a stress free life. Don't disappoint your boss or he will fire you and you will have to find a new job and start from scratch...
